formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'TestServer' =-
[Synopsis] Execute Interface Test Server
[Description] TestServer(): Perform test server function and write call report. Results stored in /var/log/asterisk/testreports/<testid>-server.txt

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ Execute Interface Test Server
[Description] - TestServer(): Perform test server function and write call report. + TestServer(): Perform test server function and write call report. Results stored in /var/log/asterisk/testreports/<testid>-server.txt
